<Text: Braves Field was a baseball park in the Northeastern United States, located in Boston, Massachusetts.>

--------------------
<Text: Braves Field:  Today the site is home to Nickerson Field on the campus of Boston University.>

2:
--------------------
Text: Braves Field:  The stadium was home of the Boston Braves of the National League from 1915–1952, prior to the Braves' move to Milwaukee in 1953.

Text: Braves Field:  From 1929 to 1932, the Boston Red Sox played select regular season games periodically at Braves Field.

--------------------
Text: Braves Field:  On May 1, 1926, Braves Field hosted the longest baseball game in history – 26 Innings.
